name: AS_GSS_TMG_UT_checkIfAnyTasksIsNotCheckbox
description: Returns true if any task is not a checkbox type behavior task
sail_code:
or(
  rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!tasks),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: ri!tasks,
    expression: fv!item.taskBehaviorType.behaviorTypeCode <> cons!AS_GSS_TMG_ENUM_TASK_BEHAVIOR_TYPE_CODE_CHECKBOX
  )
)
